description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You've played Hangman before... but you're tired of always waiting for your friend to come up with a word, or waiting for them to remember how to spell it when you guess a letter.  Well, these problems are GONE with Super Awesome Hangman Deluxe.  Enjoy Hangman with no fuss, no muss!  Now with unlockable trophies!  Wow!
description.short: You've played Hangman before... but you're tired of always waiting for your friend to come up with a word, or waiting for them to remember how to spell it when you guess a letter.
